verses.verse: The lot<WH1486> came<WH3318> out for the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> from the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho,<WH3405> at the waters<WH4325> of Jericho<WH3405> on the east,<WH4217> even the wilderness,<WH4057> going up<WH5927> from Jericho<WH3405> through the hill country<WH2022> to Bethel.<WH1008>
It went out<WH3318> from Bethel<WH1008> to Luz,<WH3870> and passed along<WH5674> to the border<WH1366> of the Archites<WH757> to Ataroth;<WH5852>

and it went down<WH3381> westward<WH3220> to the border<WH1366> of the Japhletites,<WH3311> to the border<WH1366> of Beth Horon<WH1032> the lower,<WH8481> even to Gezer;<WH1507> and ended<WH8444> at the sea.<WH3220>
The children<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim,<WH669> took their inheritance.<WH5157>

This was the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families.<WH4940> The border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> eastward<WH4217> was Ataroth Addar,<WH5853> to Beth Horon<WH1032> the upper.<WH5945>

The border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> westward<WH3220> at Michmethath<WH4366> on the north.<WH6828> The border<WH1366> turned about<WH5437> eastward<WH4217> to Taanath Shiloh,<WH8387> and passed<WH5674> along it on the east<WH4217> of Janoah.<WH3239>
It went down<WH3381> from Janoah<WH3239> to Ataroth,<WH5852> to Naarah,<WH5292> reached<WH6293> to Jericho,<WH3405> and went out<WH3318> at the Jordan.<WH3383>

From Tappuah<WH8599> the border<WH1366> went along westward<WH3220> to the brook<WH5158> of Kanah;<WH7071> and ended<WH8444> at the sea.<WH3220> This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families;<WH4940>

together with the cities<WH5892> which were set apart<WH3995> for the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> in the midst<WH8432> of the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> all the cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

They didn't<WH3423> drive out the Canaanites<WH3669> who lived<WH3427> in Gezer;<WH1507> but the Canaanites<WH3669> dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH7130> of Ephraim<WH669> to this day,<WH3117> and have become servants<WH5647> to do forced labor.<WH4522>
